129/// World destructor
130World::~World()
131{
132 ///- Empty the kicked session set
133 while (!m_sessions.empty())
134 {
135 // not remove from queue, prevent loading new sessions
136 delete m_sessions.begin()->second;
137 m_sessions.erase(m_sessions.begin());
138 }
139
140 CliCommandHolder* command = NULL;
141 while (cliCmdQueue.next(command))
142 delete command;
143
144 VMAP::VMapFactory::clear();
145 MMAP::MMapFactory::clear();
146
147 /// @todo free addSessQueue
148}
149
150/// Find a player in a specified zone
151Player* World::FindPlayerInZone(uint32 zone)
152{
153 ///- circle through active sessions and return the first player found in the zone
154 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
155 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
156 {
157 if (!itr->second)
158 continue;
159
160 Player* player = itr->second->GetPlayer();
161 if (!player)
162 continue;
163
164 if (player->IsInWorld() && player->GetZoneId() == zone)
165 return player;
166 }
167 return NULL;
168}
169
170bool World::IsClosed() const

172 return m_isClosed;

175void World::SetClosed(bool val)

180 sScriptMgr->OnOpenStateChange(!val);
181}

183void World::SetMotd(std::string motd)
184{
185 /// we are using a string copy here to allow modifications in script hooks
186 sScriptMgr->OnMotdChange(motd);
187
188 _motd.clear();
189 boost::split(_motd, motd, boost::is_any_of("@"));
190}
191
192std::vector<std::string> const& World::GetMotd() const
193{
194 return _motd;
195}

197/// Find a session by its id
198WorldSession* World::FindSession(uint32 id) const
199{
200 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.find(id);
201
202 if (itr != m_sessions.end())
203 return itr->second; // also can return NULL for kicked session
204 else
205 return NULL;
206}
207
208/// Remove a given session
209bool World::RemoveSession(uint32 id)
210{
211 ///- Find the session, kick the user, but we can't delete session at this moment to prevent iterator invalidation
212 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.find(id);
213
214 if (itr != m_sessions.end() && itr->second)
215 {
216 if (itr->second->PlayerLoading())
217 return false;
218
219 itr->second->KickPlayer();
220 }
221
222 return true;
223}
224
225void World::AddSession(WorldSession* s)
226{
227 addSessQueue.add(s);
228}

230void World::AddInstanceSocket(std::weak_ptr<WorldSocket> sock, uint64 connectToKey)
231{
232 _linkSocketQueue.add(std::make_pair(sock, connectToKey));
233}
234
235void World::AddSession_(WorldSession* s)
236{
237 ASSERT(s);
238
239 //NOTE - Still there is race condition in WorldSession* being used in the Sockets
240
241 ///- kick already loaded player with same account (if any) and remove session
242 ///- if player is in loading and want to load again, return
243 if (!RemoveSession (s->GetAccountId()))
244 {
245 s->KickPlayer();
246 delete s; // session not added yet in session list, so not listed in queue
247 return;
248 }
249
250 // decrease session counts only at not reconnection case
251 bool decrease_session = true;
252
253 // if session already exist, prepare to it deleting at next world update
254 // NOTE - KickPlayer() should be called on "old" in RemoveSession()
255 {
256 SessionMap::const_iterator old = m_sessions.find(s->GetAccountId());
257
258 if (old != m_sessions.end())
259 {
260 // prevent decrease sessions count if session queued
261 if (RemoveQueuedPlayer(old->second))
262 decrease_session = false;
263 // not remove replaced session form queue if listed
264 delete old->second;
265 }
266 }
267
268 m_sessions[s->GetAccountId()] = s;
269
270 uint32 Sessions = GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount();
271 uint32 pLimit = GetPlayerAmountLimit();
272 uint32 QueueSize = GetQueuedSessionCount(); //number of players in the queue
273
274 //so we don't count the user trying to
275 //login as a session and queue the socket that we are using
276 if (decrease_session)
277 --Sessions;
278
279 if (pLimit > 0 && Sessions >= pLimit && !s->HasPermission(rbac::RBAC_PERM_SKIP_QUEUE) && !HasRecentlyDisconnected(s))
280 {
281 AddQueuedPlayer(s);
282 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
283 TC_LOG_INFO("misc", "PlayerQueue: Account id %u is in Queue Position (%u).", s->GetAccountId(), ++QueueSize);
284 return;
285 }
286
287 s->InitializeSession();
288
289 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
290
291 // Updates the population
292 if (pLimit > 0)
293 {
294 float popu = (float)GetActiveSessionCount(); // updated number of users on the server
295 popu /= pLimit;
296 popu *= 2;
297 TC_LOG_INFO("misc", "Server Population (%f).", popu);
298 }
299}
300
301void World::ProcessLinkInstanceSocket(std::pair<std::weak_ptr<WorldSocket>, uint64> linkInfo)
302{
303 if (std::shared_ptr<WorldSocket> sock = linkInfo.first.lock())
304 {
305 if (!sock->IsOpen())
306 return;
307
308 WorldSession::ConnectToKey key;
309 key.Raw = linkInfo.second;
310
311 WorldSession* session = FindSession(uint32(key.Fields.AccountId));
312 if (!session || session->GetConnectToInstanceKey() != linkInfo.second)
313 {
314 sock->SendAuthResponseError(AUTH_SESSION_EXPIRED);
315 sock->DelayedCloseSocket();
316 return;
317 }
318
319 sock->SetWorldSession(session);
320 session->AddInstanceConnection(sock);
321 session->HandleContinuePlayerLogin();
322 }
323}
324
325bool World::HasRecentlyDisconnected(WorldSession* session)
326{
327 if (!session)
328 return false;
329
330 if (uint32 tolerance = getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
331 {
332 for (DisconnectMap::iterator i = m_disconnects.begin(); i != m_disconnects.end();)
333 {
334 if (difftime(i->second, time(NULL)) < tolerance)
335 {
336 if (i->first == session->GetAccountId())
337 return true;
338 ++i;
339 }
340 else
341 m_disconnects.erase(i++);
342 }
343 }
344 return false;
345 }
346
347int32 World::GetQueuePos(WorldSession* sess)
348{
349 uint32 position = 1;
350
351 for (Queue::const_iterator iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin(); iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
352 if ((*iter) == sess)
353 return position;
354
355 return 0;
356}
357
358void World::AddQueuedPlayer(WorldSession* sess)
359{
360 sess->SetInQueue(true);
361 m_QueuedPlayer.push_back(sess);
362
363 // The 1st SMSG_AUTH_RESPONSE needs to contain other info too.
364 sess->SendAuthResponse(AUTH_WAIT_QUEUE, true, GetQueuePos(sess));
365}
366
367bool World::RemoveQueuedPlayer(WorldSession* sess)
368{
369 // sessions count including queued to remove (if removed_session set)
370 uint32 sessions = GetActiveSessionCount();
371
372 uint32 position = 1;
373 Queue::iterator iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin();
374
375 // search to remove and count skipped positions
376 bool found = false;
377
378 for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
379 {
380 if (*iter == sess)
381 {
382 sess->SetInQueue(false);
383 sess->ResetTimeOutTime();
384 iter = m_QueuedPlayer.erase(iter);
385 found = true; // removing queued session
386 break;
387 }
388 }
389
390 // iter point to next socked after removed or end()
391 // position store position of removed socket and then new position next socket after removed
392
393 // if session not queued then we need decrease sessions count
394 if (!found && sessions)
395 --sessions;
396
397 // accept first in queue
398 if ((!m_playerLimit || sessions < m_playerLimit) && !m_QueuedPlayer.empty())
399 {
400 WorldSession* pop_sess = m_QueuedPlayer.front();
401 pop_sess->InitializeSession();
402 m_QueuedPlayer.pop_front();
403
404 // update iter to point first queued socket or end() if queue is empty now
405 iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin();
406 position = 1;
407 }
408
409 // update position from iter to end()
410 // iter point to first not updated socket, position store new position
411 for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
412 (*iter)->SendAuthWaitQue(position);
413
414 return found;
415}

417/// Initialize config values
418void World::LoadConfigSettings(bool reload)
419{
420 if (reload)
421 {
422 std::string configError;
423 if (!sConfigMgr->Reload(configError))
424 {
425 TC_LOG_ERROR("misc", "World settings reload fail: %s.", configError.c_str());
426 return;
427 }
428 sLog->LoadFromConfig();
429 }
430
431 m_defaultDbcLocale = LocaleConstant(sConfigMgr->GetIntDefault("DBC.Locale", 0));
432
433 if (m_defaultDbcLocale >= TOTAL_LOCALES || m_defaultDbcLocale < LOCALE_enUS || m_defaultDbcLocale == LOCALE_none)
434 {
435 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Incorrect DBC.Locale! Must be >= 0 and < %d and not %d (set to 0)", TOTAL_LOCALES, LOCALE_none);
436 m_defaultDbcLocale = LOCALE_enUS;
437 }
438
439 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using %s DBC Locale", localeNames[m_defaultDbcLocale]);
440
441 ///- Read the player limit and the Message of the day from the config file
442 SetPlayerAmountLimit(sConfigMgr->GetIntDefault("PlayerLimit", 100));
443 SetMotd(sConfigMgr->GetStringDefault("Motd", "Welcome to a Trinity Core Server."));
444
445 ///- Read support system setting from the config file
446 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetBoolDefault("Support.Enabled", true);
447 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_TICKETS_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetBoolDefault("Support.TicketsEnabled", false);
448 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_BUGS_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetBoolDefault("Support.BugsEnabled", false);
449 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_COMPLAINTS_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetBoolDefault("Support.ComplaintsEnabled", false);
450 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_SUGGESTIONS_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetBoolDefault("Support.SuggestionsEnabled", false);
451 if (reload)
452 {
453 sSupportMgr->SetSupportSystemStatus(m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_ENABLED]);
454 sSupportMgr->SetTicketSystemStatus(m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_TICKETS_ENABLED]);
455 sSupportMgr->SetBugSystemStatus(m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_BUGS_ENABLED]);
456 sSupportMgr->SetComplaintSystemStatus(m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_COMPLAINTS_ENABLED]);
457 sSupportMgr->SetSuggestionSystemStatus(m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SUPPORT_SUGGESTIONS_ENABLED]);
458 }
459
460
461 ///- Get string for new logins (newly created characters)
462 SetNewCharString(sConfigMgr->GetStringDefault("PlayerStart.String", ""));
463
464 ///- Send server info on login?
465 m_int_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_SINFO_LOGIN] = sConfigMgr->GetIntDefault("Server.LoginInfo", 0);
466
467 ///- Read all rates from the config file
468 rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Health", 1.0f);
469 if (rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] < 0)
470 {
471 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Health (%f) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_HEALTH]);
472 rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] = 1;
473 }
474 rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Mana", 1.0f);
475 if (rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] < 0)
476 {
477 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Mana (%f) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA]);
478 rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] = 1;
479 }
480 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_INCOME] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Rage.Income", 1.0f);
481 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Rage.Loss", 1.0f);
482 if (rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS] < 0)
483 {
484 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Rage.Loss (%f) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS]);
485 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS] = 1;
486 }
487 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_INCOME] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.RunicPower.Income", 1.0f);
488 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_LOSS] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.RunicPower.Loss", 1.0f);
489 if (rate_values[RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_LOSS] < 0)
490 {
491 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.RunicPower.Loss (%f) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_LOSS]);
492 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_LOSS] = 1;

557 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.MoveSpeed (%f) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_MOVESPEED]);
558 rate_values[RATE_MOVESPEED] = 1.0f;
559 }
560 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_MOVE_TYPE; ++i) playerBaseMoveSpeed[i] = baseMoveSpeed[i] * rate_values[RATE_MOVESPEED];
561 rate_values[RATE_CORPSE_DECAY_LOOTED] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Corpse.Decay.Looted", 0.5f);
562
563 rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("TargetPosRecalculateRange", 1.5f);
564 if (rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE] < CONTACT_DISTANCE)
565 {
566 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "TargetPosRecalculateRange (%f) must be >= %f. Using %f instead.", rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE], CONTACT_DISTANCE, CONTACT_DISTANCE);
567 rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE] = CONTACT_DISTANCE;
568 }
569 else if (rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE] > NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE)
570 {
571 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "TargetPosRecalculateRange (%f) must be <= %f. Using %f instead.",
572 rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE], NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE, NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE);
573 rate_values[RATE_TARGET_POS_RECALCULATION_RANGE] = NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE;
574 }
575
576 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("DurabilityLoss.OnDeath", 10.0f);
577 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] < 0.0f)
578 {
579 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLoss.OnDeath (%f) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH]);
580 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = 0.0f;
581 }
582 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] > 100.0f)
583 {
584 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLoss.OnDeath (%f) must be <= 100. Using 100.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH]);
585 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = 0.0f;
586 }
587 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] = rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ON_DEATH] / 100.0f;
588
589 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("DurabilityLossChance.Damage", 0.5f);
590 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] < 0.0f)
591 {
592 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Damage (%f) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE]);
593 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE] = 0.0f;
594 }
595 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("DurabilityLossChance.Absorb", 0.5f);
596 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] < 0.0f)
597 {
598 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Absorb (%f) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB]);
599 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_ABSORB] = 0.0f;
600 }
601 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("DurabilityLossChance.Parry", 0.05f);
602 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] < 0.0f)
603 {
604 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Parry (%f) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY]);
605 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_PARRY] = 0.0f;
606 }
607 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("DurabilityLossChance.Block", 0.05f);
608 if (rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] < 0.0f)
609 {
610 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DurabilityLossChance.Block (%f) must be >=0. Using 0.0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK]);
611 rate_values[RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_BLOCK] = 0.0f;
612 }
613 rate_values[RATE_MONEY_QUEST] = sConfigMgr->GetFloatDefault("Rate.Quest.Money.Reward", 1.0f);
614 if (rate_values[RATE_MONEY_QUEST] < 0.0f)
615 {
616 TC_LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Quest.Money.Reward (%f) must be >=0. Using 0 instead.", rate_values[RATE_MONEY_QUEST]);
617 rate_values[RATE_MONEY_QUEST] = 0.0f;

1175 m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS;

1177 if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS)

1199 }
1200 else if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)

1411
1412extern void LoadGameObjectModelList(std::string const& dataPath);
1413
1414/// Initialize the World
1415void World::SetInitialWorldSettings()
1416{
1417 ///- Server startup begin
1418 uint32 startupBegin = getMSTime();
1419
1420 ///- Initialize the random number generator
1421 srand((unsigned int)time(NULL));
1422
1423 ///- Initialize detour memory management
1424 dtAllocSetCustom(dtCustomAlloc, dtCustomFree);
1425
1426 ///- Initialize VMapManager function pointers (to untangle game/collision circular deps)
1427 if (VMAP::VMapManager2* vmmgr2 = dynamic_cast<VMAP::VMapManager2*>(VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapManager()))
1428 {
1429 vmmgr2->GetLiquidFlagsPtr = &GetLiquidFlags;
1430 vmmgr2->IsVMAPDisabledForPtr = &DisableMgr::IsVMAPDisabledFor;
1431 }
1432
1433 ///- Initialize config settings
1434 LoadConfigSettings();
1435
1436 ///- Initialize Allowed Security Level
1437 LoadDBAllowedSecurityLevel();
1438
1439 ///- Init highest guids before any table loading to prevent using not initialized guids in some code.
1440 sObjectMgr->SetHighestGuids();
1441
1442 ///- Check the existence of the map files for all races' startup areas.
1443 if (!MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -6240.32f, 331.033f)
1444 || !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -8949.95f, -132.493f)
1445 || !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -618.518f, -4251.67f)
1446 || !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(0, 1676.35f, 1677.45f)
1447 || !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(1, 10311.3f, 832.463f)
1448 || !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -2917.58f, -257.98f)
1449 || (m_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION] && (
1450 !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(530, 10349.6f, -6357.29f) ||
1451 !MapManager::ExistMapAndVMap(530, -3961.64f, -13931.2f))))
1452 {
1453 TC_LOG_FATAL("server.loading", "Unable to load critical files - server shutting down !!!");
1454 exit(1);
1455 }
1456
1457 ///- Initialize pool manager
1458 sPoolMgr->Initialize();
1459
1460 ///- Initialize game event manager
1461 sGameEventMgr->Initialize();
1462
1463 ///- Loading strings. Getting no records means core load has to be canceled because no error message can be output.
1464
1465 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Trinity strings...");
1466 if (!sObjectMgr->LoadTrinityStrings())
1467 exit(1); // Error message displayed in function already
1468
1469 ///- Update the realm entry in the database with the realm type from the config file
1470 //No SQL injection as values are treated as integers
1471
1472 // not send custom type REALM_FFA_PVP to realm list
1473 uint32 server_type = IsFFAPvPRealm() ? uint32(REALM_TYPE_PVP) : getIntConfig(CONFIG_GAME_TYPE);
1474 uint32 realm_zone = getIntConfig(CONFIG_REALM_ZONE);
1475

1965 localtime_r(&m_gameTime, &localTm);
1966 mail_timer = ((((localTm.tm_hour + 20) % 24)* HOUR * IN_MILLISECONDS) / m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].GetInterval());
1967 //1440
1968 mail_timer_expires = ((DAY * IN_MILLISECONDS) / (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].GetInterval()));

2021 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Deleting expired bans...");
2022 LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE unbandate <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND unbandate<>bandate"); // One-time query
2023

2025 InitDailyQuestResetTime();
2026

2028 InitWeeklyQuestResetTime();
2029
2030 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate next monthly quest reset time...");

2037 InitGuildResetTime();
2038
2039 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate next currency reset time...");
2040 InitCurrencyResetTime();
2041
2042 LoadCharacterInfoStore();
2043
2044 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading race and class expansion requirements...");
2045 sObjectMgr->LoadRaceAndClassExpansionRequirements();
2046
2047 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading character templates...");

2055

2057

2064void World::ResetTimeDiffRecord()
2065{
2066 if (m_updateTimeCount != 1)
2067 return;
2068
2069 m_currentTime = getMSTime();
2070}
2071
2072void World::RecordTimeDiff(std::string const& text)
2073{
2074 if (m_updateTimeCount != 1)
2075 return;
2076
2077 uint32 thisTime = getMSTime();
2078 uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(m_currentTime, thisTime);
2079
2080 if (diff > m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LOG_UPDATE])
2081 TC_LOG_INFO("misc", "Difftime %s: %u.", text.c_str(), diff);
2082
2083 m_currentTime = thisTime;
2084}

2086void World::LoadAutobroadcasts()
2087{
2088 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2089
2090 m_Autobroadcasts.clear();
2091 m_AutobroadcastsWeights.clear();
2092
2093 uint32 realmId = sConfigMgr->GetIntDefault("RealmID", 0);
2094 PreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_SEL_AUTOBROADCAST);
2095 stmt->setInt32(0, realmId);
2096 PreparedQueryResult result = LoginDatabase.Query(stmt);
2097
2098 if (!result)
2099 {
2100 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 autobroadcasts definitions. DB table `autobroadcast` is empty for this realm!");
2101 return;
2102 }
2103
2104 uint32 count = 0;
2105
2106 do
2107 {
2108 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2109 uint8 id = fields[0].GetUInt8();
2110
2111 m_Autobroadcasts[id] = fields[2].GetString();
2112 m_AutobroadcastsWeights[id] = fields[1].GetUInt8();
2113
2114 ++count;
2115 } while (result->NextRow());
2116
2117 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u autobroadcast definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2118}

2120/// Update the World !
2121void World::Update(uint32 diff)
2122{
2123 m_updateTime = diff;
2124
2125 if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_LOG_UPDATE] && diff > m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LOG_UPDATE])
2126 {
2127 if (m_updateTimeSum > m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_LOG_UPDATE])
2128 {
2129 TC_LOG_DEBUG("misc", "Update time diff: %u. Players online: %u.", m_updateTimeSum / m_updateTimeCount, GetActiveSessionCount());
2130 m_updateTimeSum = m_updateTime;
2131 m_updateTimeCount = 1;
2132 }
2133 else
2134 {
2135 m_updateTimeSum += m_updateTime;
2136 ++m_updateTimeCount;
2137 }
2138 }
2139
2140 ///- Update the different timers
2141 for (int i = 0; i < WUPDATE_COUNT; ++i)
2142 {
2143 if (m_timers[i].GetCurrent() >= 0)
2144 m_timers[i].Update(diff);
2145 else
2146 m_timers[i].SetCurrent(0);
2147 }
2148
2149 ///- Update the game time and check for shutdown time
2150 _UpdateGameTime();
2151
2152 /// Handle daily quests reset time
2153 if (m_gameTime > m_NextDailyQuestReset)
2154 {
2155 DailyReset();
2156 m_NextDailyQuestReset += DAY;
2157 }
2158
2159 /// Handle weekly quests reset time
2160 if (m_gameTime > m_NextWeeklyQuestReset)
2161 ResetWeeklyQuests();
2162
2163 /// Handle monthly quests reset time
2164 if (m_gameTime > m_NextMonthlyQuestReset)
2165 ResetMonthlyQuests();
2166
2167 if (m_gameTime > m_NextRandomBGReset)
2168 ResetRandomBG();
2169
2170 if (m_gameTime > m_NextGuildReset)
2171 ResetGuildCap();
2172
2173 if (m_gameTime > m_NextCurrencyReset)
2174 ResetCurrencyWeekCap();
2175
2176 /// <ul><li> Handle auctions when the timer has passed
2177 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Passed())
2178 {
2179 m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Reset();
2180
2181 ///- Update mails (return old mails with item, or delete them)
2182 //(tested... works on win)
2183 if (++mail_timer > mail_timer_expires)
2184 {
2185 mail_timer = 0;
2186 sObjectMgr->ReturnOrDeleteOldMails(true);
2187 }
2188
2189 ///- Handle expired auctions
2190 sAuctionMgr->Update();
2191 }
2192
2193 /// <li> Handle AHBot operations
2194 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AHBOT].Passed())
2195 {
2196 sAuctionBot->Update();
2197 m_timers[WUPDATE_AHBOT].Reset();
2198 }
2199
2200 /// <li> Handle session updates when the timer has passed
2201 ResetTimeDiffRecord();
2202 UpdateSessions(diff);
2203 RecordTimeDiff("UpdateSessions");
2204
2205 /// <li> Handle weather updates when the timer has passed
2206 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Passed())
2207 {
2208 m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Reset();
2209 WeatherMgr::Update(uint32(m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].GetInterval()));
2210 }
2211
2212 /// <li> Update uptime table
2213 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Passed())
2214 {
2215 uint32 tmpDiff = uint32(m_gameTime - m_startTime);
2216 uint32 maxOnlinePlayers = GetMaxPlayerCount();
2217
2218 m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
2219
2220 PreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_UPTIME_PLAYERS);
2221
2222 stmt->setUInt32(0, tmpDiff);
2223 stmt->setUInt16(1, uint16(maxOnlinePlayers));
2224 stmt->setUInt32(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2225 stmt->setUInt32(3, uint32(m_startTime));
2226
2227 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2228 }
2229
2230 /// <li> Clean logs table
2231 if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME) > 0) // if not enabled, ignore the timer
2232 {
2233 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Passed())
2234 {
2235 m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
2236
2237 PreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_OLD_LOGS);
2238
2239 stmt->setUInt32(0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME));
2240 stmt->setUInt32(1, uint32(time(0)));
2241
2242 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2243 }
2244 }
2245
2246 /// <li> Handle all other objects
2247 ///- Update objects when the timer has passed (maps, transport, creatures, ...)
2248 ResetTimeDiffRecord();
2249 sMapMgr->Update(diff);
2250 RecordTimeDiff("UpdateMapMgr");
2251
2252 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST))
2253 {
2254 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Passed())
2255 {
2256 m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Reset();
2257 SendAutoBroadcast();
2258 }
2259 }
2260
2261 sBattlegroundMgr->Update(diff);
2262 RecordTimeDiff("UpdateBattlegroundMgr");
2263
2264 sOutdoorPvPMgr->Update(diff);
2265 RecordTimeDiff("UpdateOutdoorPvPMgr");
2266
2267 sBattlefieldMgr->Update(diff);
2268 RecordTimeDiff("BattlefieldMgr");
2269
2270 ///- Delete all characters which have been deleted X days before
2271 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_DELETECHARS].Passed())
2272 {
2273 m_timers[WUPDATE_DELETECHARS].Reset();
2274 Player::DeleteOldCharacters();
2275 }
2276
2277 sLFGMgr->Update(diff);
2278 RecordTimeDiff("UpdateLFGMgr");
2279
2280 sGroupMgr->Update(diff);
2281 RecordTimeDiff("GroupMgr");
2282
2283 // execute callbacks from sql queries that were queued recently
2284 ProcessQueryCallbacks();
2285 RecordTimeDiff("ProcessQueryCallbacks");
2286
2287 ///- Erase corpses once every 20 minutes
2288 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Passed())
2289 {
2290 m_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Reset();
2291 sMapMgr->DoForAllMaps([](Map* map)
2292 {
2293 map->RemoveOldCorpses();
2294 });
2295 }
2296
2297 ///- Process Game events when necessary
2298 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Passed())
2299 {
2300 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset(); // to give time for Update() to be processed
2301 uint32 nextGameEvent = sGameEventMgr->Update();
2302 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].SetInterval(nextGameEvent);
2303 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset();
2304 }
2305
2306 ///- Ping to keep MySQL connections alive
2307 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Passed())
2308 {
2309 m_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Reset();
2310 TC_LOG_DEBUG("misc", "Ping MySQL to keep connection alive");
2311 CharacterDatabase.KeepAlive();
2312 LoginDatabase.KeepAlive();
2313 WorldDatabase.KeepAlive();
2314 }
2315
2316 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_GUILDSAVE].Passed())
2317 {
2318 m_timers[WUPDATE_GUILDSAVE].Reset();
2319 sGuildMgr->SaveGuilds();
2320 }
2321
2322 // update the instance reset times
2323 sInstanceSaveMgr->Update();
2324
2325 // And last, but not least handle the issued cli commands
2326 ProcessCliCommands();
2327
2328 sScriptMgr->OnWorldUpdate(diff);
2329}

2339/// Send a packet to all players (except self if mentioned)
2340void World::SendGlobalMessage(WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, uint32 team)
2341{
2342 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
2343 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2344 {
2345 if (itr->second &&
2346 itr->second->GetPlayer() &&
2347 itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld() &&
2348 itr->second != self &&
2349 (team == 0 || itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetTeam() == team))
2350 {
2351 itr->second->SendPacket(packet);
2352 }
2353 }
2354}
2355
2356/// Send a packet to all GMs (except self if mentioned)
2357void World::SendGlobalGMMessage(WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, uint32 team)
2358{
2359 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2360 {
2361 // check if session and can receive global GM Messages and its not self
2362 WorldSession* session = itr->second;
2363 if (!session || session == self || !session->HasPermission(rbac::RBAC_PERM_RECEIVE_GLOBAL_GM_TEXTMESSAGE))
2364 continue;
2365
2366 // Player should be in world
2367 Player* player = session->GetPlayer();
2368 if (!player || !player->IsInWorld())
2369 continue;
2370
2371 // Send only to same team, if team is given
2372 if (!team || player->GetTeam() == team)
2373 session->SendPacket(packet);
2374 }
2375}

2377namespace Trinity
2378{
2379 class WorldWorldTextBuilder
2380 {
2381 public:
2382 typedef std::vector<WorldPackets::Packet*> WorldPacketList;
2383 static size_t const BufferSize = 2048;
2384
2385 explicit WorldWorldTextBuilder(uint32 textId, va_list* args = NULL) : i_textId(textId), i_args(args) { }
2386
2387 void operator()(WorldPacketList& dataList, LocaleConstant locale)
2388 {
2389 char const* text = sObjectMgr->GetTrinityString(i_textId, locale);
2390
2391 char strBuffer[BufferSize];
2392 if (i_args)
2393 {
2394 // we need copy va_list before use or original va_list will corrupted
2395 va_list ap;
2396 va_copy(ap, *i_args);
2397 vsnprintf(strBuffer, BufferSize, text, ap);
2398 va_end(ap);
2399 }
2400 else
2401 {
2402 std::strncpy(strBuffer, text, BufferSize);
2403 strBuffer[BufferSize - 1] = '\0';
2404 }
2405
2406 do_helper(dataList, strBuffer);
2407 }
2408
2409 private:
2410 void do_helper(WorldPacketList& dataList, char* text)
2411 {
2412 while (char* line = ChatHandler::LineFromMessage(text))
2413 {
2414 WorldPackets::Chat::Chat* packet = new WorldPackets::Chat::Chat();
2415 packet->Initialize(CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr, nullptr, line);
2416 packet->Write();
2417 dataList.push_back(packet);
2418 }
2419 }
2420
2421 uint32 i_textId;
2422 va_list* i_args;
2423 };
2424} // namespace Trinity
2425
2426/// Send a System Message to all players (except self if mentioned)
2427void World::SendWorldText(uint32 string_id, ...)
2428{
2429 va_list ap;
2430 va_start(ap, string_id);
2431
2432 Trinity::WorldWorldTextBuilder wt_builder(string_id, &ap);
2433 Trinity::LocalizedPacketListDo<Trinity::WorldWorldTextBuilder> wt_do(wt_builder);
2434 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2435 {
2436 if (!itr->second || !itr->second->GetPlayer() || !itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld())
2437 continue;
2438
2439 wt_do(itr->second->GetPlayer());
2440 }
2441
2442 va_end(ap);
2443}
2444
2445/// Send a System Message to all GMs (except self if mentioned)
2446void World::SendGMText(uint32 string_id, ...)
2447{
2448 va_list ap;
2449 va_start(ap, string_id);
2450
2451 Trinity::WorldWorldTextBuilder wt_builder(string_id, &ap);
2452 Trinity::LocalizedPacketListDo<Trinity::WorldWorldTextBuilder> wt_do(wt_builder);
2453 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2454 {
2455 // Session should have permissions to receive global gm messages
2456 WorldSession* session = itr->second;
2457 if (!session || !session->HasPermission(rbac::RBAC_PERM_RECEIVE_GLOBAL_GM_TEXTMESSAGE))
2458 continue;
2459
2460 // Player should be in world
2461 Player* player = session->GetPlayer();
2462 if (!player || !player->IsInWorld())
2463 continue;
2464
2465 wt_do(player);
2466 }
2467
2468 va_end(ap);
2469}

2471/// DEPRECATED, only for debug purpose. Send a System Message to all players (except self if mentioned)
2472void World::SendGlobalText(const char* text, WorldSession* self)
2473{
2474 // need copy to prevent corruption by strtok call in LineFromMessage original string
2475 char* buf = strdup(text);
2476 char* pos = buf;
2477
2478 while (char* line = ChatHandler::LineFromMessage(pos))
2479 {
2480 WorldPackets::Chat::Chat packet;
2481 packet.Initialize(CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr, nullptr, line);
2482 SendGlobalMessage(packet.Write(), self);
2483 }
2484
2485 free(buf);
2486}

2488/// Send a packet to all players (or players selected team) in the zone (except self if mentioned)
2489bool World::SendZoneMessage(uint32 zone, WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, uint32 team)
2490{
2491 bool foundPlayerToSend = false;
2492 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
2493
2494 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2495 {
2496 if (itr->second &&
2497 itr->second->GetPlayer() &&
2498 itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld() &&
2499 itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetZoneId() == zone &&
2500 itr->second != self &&
2501 (team == 0 || itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetTeam() == team))
2502 {
2503 itr->second->SendPacket(packet);
2504 foundPlayerToSend = true;
2505 }
2506 }
2507
2508 return foundPlayerToSend;
2509}

2538/// Ban an account or ban an IP address, duration will be parsed using TimeStringToSecs if it is positive, otherwise permban
2539BanReturn World::BanAccount(BanMode mode, std::string const& nameOrIP, std::string const& duration, std::string const& reason, std::string const& author)
2540{
2541 uint32 duration_secs = TimeStringToSecs(duration);
2542 return BanAccount(mode, nameOrIP, duration_secs, reason, author);
2543}
2544
2545/// Ban an account or ban an IP address, duration is in seconds if positive, otherwise permban
2546BanReturn World::BanAccount(BanMode mode, std::string const& nameOrIP, uint32 duration_secs, std::string const& reason, std::string const& author)
2547{
2548 PreparedQueryResult resultAccounts = PreparedQueryResult(NULL); //used for kicking
2549 PreparedStatement* stmt = NULL;
2550
2551 ///- Update the database with ban information
2552 switch (mode)
2553 {
2554 case BAN_IP:
2555 // No SQL injection with prepared statements
2556 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_SEL_ACCOUNT_BY_IP);
2557 stmt->setString(0, nameOrIP);
2558 resultAccounts = LoginDatabase.Query(stmt);
2559 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_INS_IP_BANNED);
2560 stmt->setString(0, nameOrIP);
2561 stmt->setUInt32(1, duration_secs);
2562 stmt->setString(2, author);
2563 stmt->setString(3, reason);
2564 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2565 break;
2566 case BAN_ACCOUNT:
2567 // No SQL injection with prepared statements
2568 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_SEL_ACCOUNT_ID_BY_NAME);
2569 stmt->setString(0, nameOrIP);
2570 resultAccounts = LoginDatabase.Query(stmt);
2571 break;
2572 case BAN_CHARACTER:
2573 // No SQL injection with prepared statements
2574 stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_SEL_ACCOUNT_BY_NAME);
2575 stmt->setString(0, nameOrIP);
2576 resultAccounts = CharacterDatabase.Query(stmt);
2577 break;
2578 default:
2579 return BAN_SYNTAX_ERROR;
2580 }
2581
2582 if (!resultAccounts)
2583 {
2584 if (mode == BAN_IP)
2585 return BAN_SUCCESS; // ip correctly banned but nobody affected (yet)
2586 else
2587 return BAN_NOTFOUND; // Nobody to ban
2588 }
2589
2590 ///- Disconnect all affected players (for IP it can be several)
2591 SQLTransaction trans = LoginDatabase.BeginTransaction();
2592 do
2593 {
2594 Field* fieldsAccount = resultAccounts->Fetch();
2595 uint32 account = fieldsAccount[0].GetUInt32();
2596
2597 if (mode != BAN_IP)
2598 {
2599 // make sure there is only one active ban
2600 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_ACCOUNT_NOT_BANNED);
2601 stmt->setUInt32(0, account);
2602 trans->Append(stmt);
2603 // No SQL injection with prepared statements
2604 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_INS_ACCOUNT_BANNED);
2605 stmt->setUInt32(0, account);
2606 stmt->setUInt32(1, duration_secs);
2607 stmt->setString(2, author);
2608 stmt->setString(3, reason);
2609 trans->Append(stmt);
2610 }
2611
2612 if (WorldSession* sess = FindSession(account))
2613 if (std::string(sess->GetPlayerName()) != author)
2614 sess->KickPlayer();
2615 } while (resultAccounts->NextRow());
2616
2617 LoginDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
2618
2619 return BAN_SUCCESS;
2620}
2621
2622/// Remove a ban from an account or IP address
2623bool World::RemoveBanAccount(BanMode mode, std::string const& nameOrIP)
2624{
2625 PreparedStatement* stmt = NULL;
2626 if (mode == BAN_IP)
2627 {
2628 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_IP_NOT_BANNED);
2629 stmt->setString(0, nameOrIP);
2630 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2631 }
2632 else
2633 {
2634 uint32 account = 0;
2635 if (mode == BAN_ACCOUNT)
2636 account = AccountMgr::GetId(nameOrIP);
2637 else if (mode == BAN_CHARACTER)
2638 account = ObjectMgr::GetPlayerAccountIdByPlayerName(nameOrIP);
2639
2640 if (!account)
2641 return false;
2642
2643 //NO SQL injection as account is uint32
2644 stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_ACCOUNT_NOT_BANNED);
2645 stmt->setUInt32(0, account);
2646 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2647 }
2648 return true;
2649}
2650
2651/// Ban an account or ban an IP address, duration will be parsed using TimeStringToSecs if it is positive, otherwise permban
2652BanReturn World::BanCharacter(std::string const& name, std::string const& duration, std::string const& reason, std::string const& author)
2653{
2654 Player* pBanned = ObjectAccessor::FindConnectedPlayerByName(name);
2655 ObjectGuid guid;
2656
2657 uint32 duration_secs = TimeStringToSecs(duration);
2658
2659 /// Pick a player to ban if not online
2660 if (!pBanned)
2661 {
2662 guid = ObjectMgr::GetPlayerGUIDByName(name);
2663 if (guid.IsEmpty())
2664 return BAN_NOTFOUND; // Nobody to ban
2665 }
2666 else
2667 guid = pBanned->GetGUID();
2668
2669 // make sure there is only one active ban
2670 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_UPD_CHARACTER_BAN);
2671 stmt->setUInt64(0, guid.GetCounter());
2672 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2673
2674 stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_INS_CHARACTER_BAN);
2675 stmt->setUInt64(0, guid.GetCounter());
2676 stmt->setUInt32(1, duration_secs);
2677 stmt->setString(2, author);
2678 stmt->setString(3, reason);
2679 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2680
2681 if (pBanned)
2682 pBanned->GetSession()->KickPlayer();
2683
2684 return BAN_SUCCESS;
2685}
2686
2687/// Remove a ban from a character
2688bool World::RemoveBanCharacter(std::string const& name)
2689{
2690 Player* pBanned = ObjectAccessor::FindConnectedPlayerByName(name);
2691 ObjectGuid guid;
2692
2693 /// Pick a player to ban if not online
2694 if (!pBanned)
2695 {
2696 guid = ObjectMgr::GetPlayerGUIDByName(name);
2697 if (guid.IsEmpty())
2698 return false; // Nobody to ban
2699 }
2700 else
2701 guid = pBanned->GetGUID();
2702
2703 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_UPD_CHARACTER_BAN);
2704 stmt->setUInt64(0, guid.GetCounter());
2705 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2706 return true;
2707}
2708
2709/// Update the game time
2710void World::_UpdateGameTime()
2711{
2712 ///- update the time
2713 time_t thisTime = time(NULL);
2714 uint32 elapsed = uint32(thisTime - m_gameTime);
2715 m_gameTime = thisTime;
2716
2717 ///- if there is a shutdown timer
2718 if (!IsStopped() && m_ShutdownTimer > 0 && elapsed > 0)
2719 {
2720 ///- ... and it is overdue, stop the world (set m_stopEvent)
2721 if (m_ShutdownTimer <= elapsed)
2722 {
2723 if (!(m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2724 m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2725 else
2726 m_ShutdownTimer = 1; // minimum timer value to wait idle state
2727 }
2728 ///- ... else decrease it and if necessary display a shutdown countdown to the users
2729 else
2730 {
2731 m_ShutdownTimer -= elapsed;
2732
2733 ShutdownMsg();
2734 }
2735 }
2736}
2737
2738/// Shutdown the server
2739void World::ShutdownServ(uint32 time, uint32 options, uint8 exitcode, const std::string& reason)
2740{
2741 // ignore if server shutdown at next tick
2742 if (IsStopped())
2743 return;
2744
2745 m_ShutdownMask = options;
2746 m_ExitCode = exitcode;
2747
2748 ///- If the shutdown time is 0, set m_stopEvent (except if shutdown is 'idle' with remaining sessions)
2749 if (time == 0)
2750 {
2751 if (!(options & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2752 m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2753 else
2754 m_ShutdownTimer = 1; //So that the session count is re-evaluated at next world tick
2755 }
2756 ///- Else set the shutdown timer and warn users
2757 else
2758 {
2759 m_ShutdownTimer = time;
2760 ShutdownMsg(true, nullptr, reason);
2761 }
2762
2763 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownInitiate(ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), ShutdownMask(options));
2764}
2765
2766/// Display a shutdown message to the user(s)
2767void World::ShutdownMsg(bool show, Player* player, const std::string& reason)
2768{
2769 // not show messages for idle shutdown mode
2770 if (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE)
2771 return;
2772
2773 ///- Display a message every 12 hours, hours, 5 minutes, minute, 5 seconds and finally seconds
2774 if (show ||
2775 (m_ShutdownTimer < 5* MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % 15) == 0) || // < 5 min; every 15 sec
2776 (m_ShutdownTimer < 15 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % MINUTE) == 0) || // < 15 min ; every 1 min
2777 (m_ShutdownTimer < 30 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % (5 * MINUTE)) == 0) || // < 30 min ; every 5 min
2778 (m_ShutdownTimer < 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % HOUR) == 0) || // < 12 h ; every 1 h
2779 (m_ShutdownTimer > 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % (12 * HOUR)) == 0)) // > 12 h ; every 12 h
2780 {
2781 std::string str = secsToTimeString(m_ShutdownTimer);
2782 if (!reason.empty())
2783 str += " - " + reason;
2784
2785 ServerMessageType msgid = (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME;
2786
2787 SendServerMessage(msgid, str, player);
2788 TC_LOG_DEBUG("misc", "Server is %s in %s", (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"), str.c_str());
2789 }
2790}
2791
2792/// Cancel a planned server shutdown
2793void World::ShutdownCancel()
2794{
2795 // nothing cancel or too later
2796 if (!m_ShutdownTimer || m_stopEvent)
2797 return;
2798
2799 ServerMessageType msgid = (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_CANCELLED : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED;
2800
2801 m_ShutdownMask = 0;
2802 m_ShutdownTimer = 0;
2803 m_ExitCode = SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE; // to default value
2804 SendServerMessage(msgid);
2805
2806 TC_LOG_DEBUG("misc", "Server %s cancelled.", (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"));
2807
2808 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownCancel();
2809}
2810
2811/// Send a server message to the user(s)
2812void World::SendServerMessage(ServerMessageType messageID, std::string stringParam /*= ""*/, Player* player /*= NULL*/)
2813{
2814 WorldPackets::Chat::ChatServerMessage chatServerMessage;
2815 chatServerMessage.MessageID = int32(messageID);
2816 if (messageID <= SERVER_MSG_STRING)
2817 chatServerMessage.StringParam = stringParam;
2818
2819 if (player)
2820 player->GetSession()->SendPacket(chatServerMessage.Write());
2821 else
2822 SendGlobalMessage(chatServerMessage.Write());
2823}
2824
2825void World::UpdateSessions(uint32 diff)
2826{
2827 std::pair<std::weak_ptr<WorldSocket>, uint64> linkInfo;
2828 while (_linkSocketQueue.next(linkInfo))
2829 ProcessLinkInstanceSocket(std::move(linkInfo));
2830
2831 ///- Add new sessions
2832 WorldSession* sess = NULL;
2833 while (addSessQueue.next(sess))
2834 AddSession_ (sess);
2835
2836 ///- Then send an update signal to remaining ones
2837 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(), next; itr != m_sessions.end(); itr = next)
2838 {
2839 next = itr;
2840 ++next;
2841
2842 ///- and remove not active sessions from the list
2843 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2844 WorldSessionFilter updater(pSession);
2845
2846 if (!pSession->Update(diff, updater)) // As interval = 0
2847 {
2848 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(itr->second) && itr->second && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2849 m_disconnects[itr->second->GetAccountId()] = time(NULL);
2850 RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession);
2851 m_sessions.erase(itr);
2852 delete pSession;
2853
2854 }
2855 }
2856}
2857
2858// This handles the issued and queued CLI commands
2859void World::ProcessCliCommands()
2860{
2861 CliCommandHolder::Print* zprint = NULL;
2862 void* callbackArg = NULL;
2863 CliCommandHolder* command = NULL;
2864 while (cliCmdQueue.next(command))
2865 {
2866 TC_LOG_INFO("misc", "CLI command under processing...");
2867 zprint = command->m_print;
2868 callbackArg = command->m_callbackArg;
2869 CliHandler handler(callbackArg, zprint);
2870 handler.ParseCommands(command->m_command);
2871 if (command->m_commandFinished)
2872 command->m_commandFinished(callbackArg, !handler.HasSentErrorMessage());
2873 delete command;
2874 }
2875}
2876
2877void World::SendAutoBroadcast()
2878{
2879 if (m_Autobroadcasts.empty())
2880 return;
2881
2882 uint32 weight = 0;
2883 AutobroadcastsWeightMap selectionWeights;
2884 std::string msg;
2885
2886 for (AutobroadcastsWeightMap::const_iterator it = m_AutobroadcastsWeights.begin(); it != m_AutobroadcastsWeights.end(); ++it)
2887 {
2888 if (it->second)
2889 {
2890 weight += it->second;
2891 selectionWeights[it->first] = it->second;
2892 }
2893 }
2894
2895 if (weight)
2896 {
2897 uint32 selectedWeight = urand(0, weight - 1);
2898 weight = 0;
2899 for (AutobroadcastsWeightMap::const_iterator it = selectionWeights.begin(); it != selectionWeights.end(); ++it)
2900 {
2901 weight += it->second;
2902 if (selectedWeight < weight)
2903 {
2904 msg = m_Autobroadcasts[it->first];
2905 break;
2906 }
2907 }
2908 }
2909 else
2910 msg = m_Autobroadcasts[urand(0, m_Autobroadcasts.size())];
2911
2912 uint32 abcenter = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_CENTER);
2913
2914 if (abcenter == 0)
2915 sWorld->SendWorldText(LANG_AUTO_BROADCAST, msg.c_str());
2916 else if (abcenter == 1)
2917 sWorld->SendGlobalMessage(WorldPackets::Chat::PrintNotification(msg).Write());
2918 else if (abcenter == 2)
2919 {
2920 sWorld->SendWorldText(LANG_AUTO_BROADCAST, msg.c_str());
2921 sWorld->SendGlobalMessage(WorldPackets::Chat::PrintNotification(msg).Write());
2922 }
2923
2924 TC_LOG_DEBUG("misc", "AutoBroadcast: '%s'", msg.c_str());
2925}

2961
2962void World::InitDailyQuestResetTime()
2963{
2964 time_t mostRecentQuestTime;
2965
2966 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT MAX(time) FROM character_queststatus_daily");
2967 if (result)
2968 {
2969 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2970 mostRecentQuestTime = time_t(fields[0].GetUInt32());
2971 }
2972 else
2973 mostRecentQuestTime = 0;
2974
2975 // client built-in time for reset is 6:00 AM
2976 // FIX ME: client not show day start time
2977 time_t curTime = time(NULL);
2978 tm localTm;
2979 localtime_r(&curTime, &localTm);
2980 localTm.tm_hour = 6;
2981 localTm.tm_min = 0;
2982 localTm.tm_sec = 0;
2983
2984 // current day reset time
2985 time_t curDayResetTime = mktime(&localTm);
2986
2987 // last reset time before current moment
2988 time_t resetTime = (curTime < curDayResetTime) ? curDayResetTime - DAY : curDayResetTime;
2989
2990 // need reset (if we have quest time before last reset time (not processed by some reason)
2991 if (mostRecentQuestTime && mostRecentQuestTime <= resetTime)
2992 m_NextDailyQuestReset = mostRecentQuestTime;
2993 else // plan next reset time
2994 m_NextDailyQuestReset = (curTime >= curDayResetTime) ? curDayResetTime + DAY : curDayResetTime;
2995}

3004void World::InitRandomBGResetTime()
3005{
3006 time_t bgtime = sWorld->getWorldState(WS_BG_DAILY_RESET_TIME);
3007 if (!bgtime)
3008 m_NextRandomBGReset = time(NULL); // game time not yet init
3009
3010 // generate time by config
3011 time_t curTime = time(NULL);
3012 tm localTm;
3013 localtime_r(&curTime, &localTm);
3014 localTm.tm_hour = getIntConfig(CONFIG_RANDOM_BG_RESET_HOUR);
3015 localTm.tm_min = 0;
3016 localTm.tm_sec = 0;
3017
3018 // current day reset time
3019 time_t nextDayResetTime = mktime(&localTm);
3020
3021 // next reset time before current moment
3022 if (curTime >= nextDayResetTime)
3023 nextDayResetTime += DAY;
3024
3025 // normalize reset time
3026 m_NextRandomBGReset = bgtime < curTime ? nextDayResetTime - DAY : nextDayResetTime;
3027
3028 if (!bgtime)
3029 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_BG_DAILY_RESET_TIME, uint64(m_NextRandomBGReset));
3030}

3060void World::InitCurrencyResetTime()
3061{
3062 time_t currencytime = sWorld->getWorldState(WS_CURRENCY_RESET_TIME);
3063 if (!currencytime)
3064 m_NextCurrencyReset = time(NULL); // game time not yet init
3065
3066 // generate time by config
3067 time_t curTime = time(NULL);
3068 tm localTm;
3069 localtime_r(&curTime, &localTm);
3070
3071 localTm.tm_wday = getIntConfig(CONFIG_CURRENCY_RESET_DAY);
3072 localTm.tm_hour = getIntConfig(CONFIG_CURRENCY_RESET_HOUR);
3073 localTm.tm_min = 0;
3074 localTm.tm_sec = 0;
3075
3076 // current week reset time
3077 time_t nextWeekResetTime = mktime(&localTm);
3078
3079 // next reset time before current moment
3080 if (curTime >= nextWeekResetTime)
3081 nextWeekResetTime += getIntConfig(CONFIG_CURRENCY_RESET_INTERVAL) * DAY;
3082
3083 // normalize reset time
3084 m_NextCurrencyReset = currencytime < curTime ? nextWeekResetTime - getIntConfig(CONFIG_CURRENCY_RESET_INTERVAL) * DAY : nextWeekResetTime;
3085
3086 if (!currencytime)
3087 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_CURRENCY_RESET_TIME, uint64(m_NextCurrencyReset));
3088}

3158void World::ResetMonthlyQuests()
3159{
3160 TC_LOG_INFO("misc", "Monthly quests reset for all characters.");
3161
3162 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_RESET_CHARACTER_QUESTSTATUS_MONTHLY);
3163 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3164
3165 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
3166 if (itr->second->GetPlayer())
3167 itr->second->GetPlayer()->ResetMonthlyQuestStatus();
3168
3169 // generate time
3170 time_t curTime = time(NULL);
3171 tm localTm;
3172 localtime_r(&curTime, &localTm);
3173
3174 int month = localTm.tm_mon;
3175 int year = localTm.tm_year;
3176
3177 ++month;
3178
3179 // month 11 is december, next is january (0)
3180 if (month > 11)
3181 {
3182 month = 0;
3183 year += 1;
3184 }
3185
3186 // reset time for next month
3187 localTm.tm_year = year;
3188 localTm.tm_mon = month;
3189 localTm.tm_mday = 1; // don't know if we really need config option for day / hour
3190 localTm.tm_hour = 0;
3191 localTm.tm_min = 0;
3192 localTm.tm_sec = 0;
3193
3194 time_t nextMonthResetTime = mktime(&localTm);
3195
3196 // plan next reset time
3197 m_NextMonthlyQuestReset = (curTime >= nextMonthResetTime) ? nextMonthResetTime + MONTH : nextMonthResetTime;
3198
3199 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_MONTHLY_QUEST_RESET_TIME, uint64(m_NextMonthlyQuestReset));
3200}

3275void World::LoadWorldStates()
3276{
3277 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3278
3279 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, value FROM worldstates");
3280
3281 if (!result)
3282 {
3283 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 world states. DB table `worldstates` is empty!");
3284
3285 return;
3286 }
3287
3288 uint32 count = 0;
3289
3290 do
3291 {
3292 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3293 m_worldstates[fields[0].GetUInt32()] = fields[1].GetUInt32();
3294 ++count;
3295 }
3296 while (result->NextRow());
3297
3298 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u world states in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3299
3300}
3301
3302// Setting a worldstate will save it to DB
3303void World::setWorldState(uint32 index, uint64 value)
3304{
3305 WorldStatesMap::const_iterator it = m_worldstates.find(index);
3306 if (it != m_worldstates.end())
3307 {
3308 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_UPD_WORLDSTATE);
3309
3310 stmt->setUInt32(0, uint32(value));
3311 stmt->setUInt32(1, index);
3312
3313 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3314 }
3315 else
3316 {
3317 PreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_INS_WORLDSTATE);
3318
3319 stmt->setUInt32(0, index);
3320 stmt->setUInt32(1, uint32(value));
3321
3322 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3323 }
3324 m_worldstates[index] = value;
3325}

3327uint64 World::getWorldState(uint32 index) const
3328{
3329 WorldStatesMap::const_iterator it = m_worldstates.find(index);
3330 return it != m_worldstates.end() ? it->second : 0;
3331}
3332
3333void World::ProcessQueryCallbacks()
3334{
3335 PreparedQueryResult result;
3336
3337 for (std::deque<PreparedQueryResultFuture>::iterator itr = m_realmCharCallbacks.begin(); itr != m_realmCharCallbacks.end(); )
3338 {
3339 if ((*itr).wait_for(std::chrono::seconds(0)) != std::future_status::ready)
3340 {
3341 ++itr;
3342 continue;
3343 }
3344
3345 result = (*itr).get();
3346 _UpdateRealmCharCount(result);
3347 itr = m_realmCharCallbacks.erase(itr);
3348 }
3349}

3351/**
3352 * @brief Loads several pieces of information on server startup with the GUID
3353 * There is no further database query necessary.
3354 * These are a number of methods that work into the calling function.
3355 *
3356 * @param guid Requires a guid to call
3357 * @return Name, Sex, Race, Class and Level of player character
3358 * Example Usage:
3359 * @code
3360 * CharacterInfo const* characterInfo = sWorld->GetCharacterInfo(GUID);
3361 * if (!nameData)
3362 * return;
3363 *
3364 * std::string playerName = characterInfo->Name;
3365 * uint8 playerGender = characterInfo->Sex;
3366 * uint8 playerRace = characterInfo->Race;
3367 * uint8 playerClass = characterInfo->Class;
3368 * uint8 playerLevel = characterInfo->Level;
3369 * @endcode
3370 */
3371
3372CharacterInfo const* World::GetCharacterInfo(ObjectGuid const& guid) const
3373{
3374 CharacterInfoContainer::const_iterator itr = _characterInfoStore.find(guid);
3375 if (itr != _characterInfoStore.end())
3376 return &itr->second;
3377
3378 return nullptr;
3379}
3380
3381void World::LoadCharacterInfoStore()
3382{
3383 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading character info store");
3384
3385 _characterInfoStore.clear();
3386
3387 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT guid, name, account, race, gender, class, level, deleteDate FROM characters");
3388 if (!result)
3389 {
3390 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "No character name data loaded, empty query");
3391 return;
3392 }
3393
3394 do
3395 {
3396 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3397 AddCharacterInfo(ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Player>(fields[0].GetUInt64()), fields[2].GetUInt32(), fields[1].GetString(),
3398 fields[4].GetUInt8() /*gender*/, fields[3].GetUInt8() /*race*/, fields[5].GetUInt8() /*class*/, fields[6].GetUInt8() /*level*/, fields[7].GetUInt32() != 0);
3399 }
3400 while (result->NextRow());
3401
3402 TC_LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loaded character infos for " SZFMTD " characters", _characterInfoStore.size());
3403}

3405void World::AddCharacterInfo(ObjectGuid const& guid, uint32 accountId, std::string const& name, uint8 gender, uint8 race, uint8 playerClass, uint8 level, bool isDeleted)
3406{
3407 CharacterInfo& data = _characterInfoStore[guid];
3408 data.Name = name;
3409 data.AccountId = accountId;
3410 data.Race = race;
3411 data.Sex = gender;
3412 data.Class = playerClass;
3413 data.Level = level;
3414 data.IsDeleted = isDeleted;
3415}

3417void World::UpdateCharacterInfo(ObjectGuid const& guid, std::string const& name, uint8 gender /*= GENDER_NONE*/, uint8 race /*= RACE_NONE*/)
3418{
3419 CharacterInfoContainer::iterator itr = _characterInfoStore.find(guid);
3420 if (itr == _characterInfoStore.end())
3421 return;
3422
3423 itr->second.Name = name;
3424
3425 if (gender != GENDER_NONE)
3426 itr->second.Sex = gender;
3427
3428 if (race != RACE_NONE)
3429 itr->second.Race = race;
3430
3431 WorldPackets::Misc::InvalidatePlayer data;
3432 data.Guid = guid;
3433 SendGlobalMessage(data.Write());
3434}

3437{

3439 if (itr == _characterInfoStore.end())
3440 return;
3441
3442 itr->second.Level = level;

3445void World::UpdateCharacterInfoDeleted(ObjectGuid const& guid, bool deleted, std::string const* name /*= nullptr*/)
3446{
3447 CharacterInfoContainer::iterator itr = _characterInfoStore.find(guid);
3448 if (itr == _characterInfoStore.end())
3449 return;
3450
3451 itr->second.IsDeleted = deleted;
3452
3453 if (name)
3454 itr->second.Name = *name;
3455}

3457void World::ReloadRBAC()
3458{
3459 // Passive reload, we mark the data as invalidated and next time a permission is checked it will be reloaded
3460 TC_LOG_INFO("rbac", "World::ReloadRBAC()");
3461 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
3462 if (WorldSession* session = itr->second)
3463 session->InvalidateRBACData();
3464}
